name: Gordon Ramsay
bio: Gordon James Ramsay OBE is a British chef, restaurateur, writer, and television personality. He has owned and operated a series of restaurants since he was 31 years old, including the three-Michelin-starred Restaurant Gordon Ramsay in London.
